# toolsHub.builders - Free Online Tools Directory

Access 20+ free online tools for text, developers, images, and SEO. No sign-up required. Instant results. Built for students, creators, and developers.

toolsHub.builders is a free online tools directory that provides instant access to powerful tools without requiring registration or payment. All tools run client-side for privacy, and new tools are added weekly based on user feedback.

## Website
https://toolshub.builders

## Key Pages

### Main Pages
- Home: https://toolshub.builders/
- All Tools: https://toolshub.builders/tools
- Tutorials: https://toolshub.builders/tutorials
- Changelog: https://toolshub.builders/changelog
- Roadmap: https://toolshub.builders/roadmap

### Legal & Support
- Privacy Policy: https://toolshub.builders/privacy
- Terms of Service: https://toolshub.builders/terms
- Cookies Policy: https://toolshub.builders/cookies
- Security: https://toolshub.builders/security
- Contact: mailto:hello@toolshub.builders

## Tools

### Text Tools
- Word Counter: https://toolshub.builders/tools/word-counter
  Count words, characters, sentences, and paragraphs instantly. Perfect for writers and content creators.

- Character Counter: https://toolshub.builders/tools/character-counter
  Count characters with and without spaces. Essential for social media posts and meta descriptions.

- Case Converter: https://toolshub.builders/tools/case-converter
  Convert text to uppercase, lowercase, title case, and sentence case instantly.

- Remove Duplicate Lines: https://toolshub.builders/tools/remove-duplicate-lines
  Remove duplicate lines from text. Clean up lists and data with one click.

- Text to Slug: https://toolshub.builders/tools/text-to-slug
  Convert any text into URL-friendly slugs for clean URLs and permalinks.

### Developer Tools
- JSON Formatter: https://toolshub.builders/tools/json-formatter
  Format, beautify, and validate JSON data with syntax highlighting and error detection.

- Base64 Encoder/Decoder: https://toolshub.builders/tools/base64-encoder-decoder
  Encode and decode Base64 strings instantly. Support for text, images, and any data.

- HTML Minifier: https://toolshub.builders/tools/html-minifier
  Minify HTML code to reduce file size. Remove whitespace and comments.

- CSS Minifier: https://toolshub.builders/tools/css-minifier
  Minify CSS code to reduce file size. Remove whitespace and comments.

- JWT Decoder: https://toolshub.builders/tools/jwt-decoder
  Decode and inspect JSON Web Tokens. View header, payload, and signature information.

### Image Tools
- Image to Base64: https://toolshub.builders/tools/image-to-base64
  Convert images to Base64 strings. Support for PNG, JPG, GIF, WebP formats.

- Image Compressor: https://toolshub.builders/tools/image-compressor
  Compress images without quality loss. Reduce file size while maintaining quality.

- PNG to JPG: https://toolshub.builders/tools/png-to-jpg
  Convert PNG images to JPG format with quality control options.

- Resize Image: https://toolshub.builders/tools/resize-image
  Resize images to any dimension. Maintain aspect ratio or set custom dimensions.

- Image Crop: https://toolshub.builders/tools/image-crop
  Crop images to any size or aspect ratio with interactive crop tool.

### SEO Tools
- Meta Tag Generator: https://toolshub.builders/tools/meta-tag-generator
  Generate SEO-friendly meta tags, Open Graph, and Twitter card meta tags.

- Robots.txt Generator: https://toolshub.builders/tools/robots-generator
  Generate robots.txt files to control search engine crawler access.

- Sitemap Generator: https://toolshub.builders/tools/sitemap-generator
  Generate XML sitemaps for search engines for better SEO.

- Keyword Density Checker: https://toolshub.builders/tools/keyword-density-checker
  Analyze keyword density in your content. Optimize text for SEO.

- Open Graph Generator: https://toolshub.builders/tools/open-graph-generator
  Generate Open Graph meta tags for social media sharing with preview.

## Features
- 20+ Free Online Tools
- No Sign-up Required
- No Usage Limits
- Client-side Processing (Privacy-focused)
- Works on All Devices
- Instant Results
- New Tools Added Weekly

## Categories
- Text Tools: Word counting, case conversion, slug generation
- Developer Tools: JSON formatting, Base64 encoding, code minification
- Image Tools: Compression, conversion, resizing, cropping
- SEO Tools: Meta tags, robots.txt, sitemap, keyword analysis

## Target Audience
- Students and academics
- Content creators and writers
- Developers and programmers
- SEO specialists and marketers
- Small business owners
- Anyone who needs quick, free online tools
